media.altText: Free same-day delivery offer: Get gifts today with code QUICKGIFTS. Ends 12/24 at 12 PM PT. Includes “See Details” button and an icon of a door with a package inside a circle of gems. Terms apply; combinable with other offers.
Image promoting Sephora’s holiday gift guide. Text reads: “Find the season’s hottest presents, offers, and more.” Includes a “Shop Now” button. Festive design encouraging holiday shopping.
Image with glittery purple background promoting Sephora gift cards and eGift cards. Text reads: “Easy to give, a joy to receive.” Includes two festive gift cards and a “Buy Now” button with an arrow.

Image with green background and gold accents promoting “Shop Gifts Now, Pay Later.” Encourages splitting payments with Klarna, Afterpay, or PayPal. Includes “Shop Now” button. Note about California Financing Law license at bottom.

Image promoting luxury beauty products. Text reads: “Always Worth It. There’s nothing better than luxe beauty.” Includes a beige container filled with high-end items from brands like Caudalie and Crown Affair. “Shop Now” button with arrow is shown.

Image promoting “Must-Have Palettes” with versatile formulas for eyes and face. Text reads: “Turn heads with versatile formulas.” Four makeup palettes shown with a mix of eyeshadows, blushes, and highlighters. Includes “Shop Now” button.

seoContent:
When it comes to serving face, we’ve got you covered. Whether you have a favorite brand or need help finding the perfect match, Sephora is your No.1 destination for everything beauty.  

If you’re looking for the best makeup (and we know you are), a good place to start is with our +[bestsellers|/beauty/best-makeup-brands|color=blue]+. Read thousands of reviews from fellow makeup-lovers and find top rated products for your beauty routine. If you’re still having a hard time finding the perfect product, check out our +[buying guides|/best-beauty-products|color=blue]+ and quizzes or consult millions of users in our +[Sephora Community|https://community.sephora.com|color=blue].+  

Make sure you have a solid foundation with the perfect primer -- this will ensure that the rest of your face makeup goes on smoothly and lasts longer. Next, it’s time for concealer. Some of the most popular foundation brands include NARS, Stila and Fenty.  

Add some color with a contour palette. Start with a darker, matte shade that simulates a shadowed-look and enunciates your cheekbones. Next, add some warmth with a +[bronzer|/shop/bronzer-makeup|color=blue]+ in a C-shape along your hairline. Finally, apply blush for that perfect rosy look. Some of the best face palette brands include Tarte and Anastasia Beverly Hills.  

Whether you want a natural or dramatic look can depend heavily on your eye makeup. For a natural look, stick to mascara, a very light eyeshadow (if any) and a boy brow. Make sure to get a good lengthening and volumizing mascara for extra lash definition. For a dramatic look, the options are endless. You’ll definitely need some liquid eyeliner, the +[perfect palette|/shop/eyeshadow-palettes|color=blue]+ and all of the brushes necessary to get started. Try some of the top eye makeup brands like Urban Decay, KVD Vegan Beauty and Too Faced.  

Last, but not least -- don’t forgot those +[lips|/shop/lipstick|color=blue]+! A more subdued look may only require some lip gloss or a shade that’s closer to your skin tone. For fuller looking lips, make use of the right lip liner and some plumping gloss. You can always make your lips stand out with a bold shade in whatever finish suits your look, whether it be glossy or matte. A couple of our favorite brands are Huda Beauty and Buxom.  

If you’re looking for +[organic makeup|/beauty/clean-beauty-products]+, we also have a wide variety with Clean at Sephora. And -- don’t forget -- you can find ALL of these beauty products in our own stunning +[Sephora Collection|/brand/sephora-collection|color=blue]+.  

Interested in learning how to achieve a certain makeup look? Check out our +[makeup classes|/happening/classes|color=blue]+ or +[makeup events|/happening/events|color=blue]+ to see if there are any available at a Sephora location near you!

itemListElement.name: Sale
itemListElement.description: Makeup sales are always on at Sephora. Shop discounted makeup, skincare, fragrance and hair care products at Sephora today. Free shipping and samples available.
